parameters.name: SpecialKey
parameters.description: The ID of the app or Alibaba Cloud account. Specify this parameter based on the value of the **SpecialType** parameter. You can view your account ID on the [Account Management](https://account.console.aliyun.com/?spm=a2c4g.11186623.2.15.3f053654YpMPwo#/secure) page.

parameters.name: SpecialType
parameters.description:
The type of the special throttling policy. Valid values:

*   **APP**
*   **USER**

parameters.name: TrafficControlId
parameters.description: The ID of the specified throttling policy.
